My name is Michael Berkovich and I started this site.
This site was created using MyHeritage.com. This is a great system that allows anyone like you and me to create a private site for their family, build their family tree and share family photos. If you have any comments or feedback about this site, please click here to contact me.
Our family tree is posted online on this site! There are 10 names in our family site. The earliest event is the birth of Michael Berkovich This is you (1977). The most recent event is the birth of Misha Avrukin Nephew (June 24 2011).
The site was last updated on Apr 23 2013, and it currently has 1 registered member(s).   Enjoy!
